dct:title: 2018 Florida CDC Social Vulnerability Index (tracts)
dct:creator: Center for Disease Control
dct:description:
Social vulnerability refers to the potential negative effects on communities caused by external stresses on human health. Such stresses include natural or human-caused disasters, or disease outbreaks. Reducing social vulnerability can decrease both human suffering and economic loss.

The CDC/ATSDR Social Vulnerability Index (CDC/ATSDR SVI) uses 16 U.S. census variables to help local officials identify communities that may need support before, during, or after disasters.
prov:action:
#########
# GDSC ETL is performed in two steps: shell script to ETL data into postgres
# and then additional transformations with SQL in postGIS (if needed).
####

#########
# Step 1 - bash script (pseudo code)
####

# create directory structure and move into it
mkdir -p /data/fl_2018_svi_tract/{download,etl} && cd /data/fl_2018_svi_tract

# set update flag based on last update and update frequency
do_update=0 if date() < last_update + update_frequency else do_update = 1

# download if update flag is set:
if do_update == 1 then
  wget -O download/fl_2018_svi_tract.zip 'https://svi.cdc.gov/Documents/Data/2018/db/states/Florida.zip'

# unzip to download directory if update flag is set
if do_update == 1 then
  unzip -d download download/fl_2018_svi_tract.zip && rm download/fl_2018_svi_tract.zip

# load into postGIS with:
  ogr2ogr -lco GEOMETRY_NAME=geom -f PostgreSQL PG:"<postgres connection>" download/SVI2018_FLORIDA_tract.gdb -nlt multipolygon -nln fl_2018_svi_tract

#########
# Step 2 - SQL script (pseudo code):
####

# remove duplicate points and make geometries valid:
UPDATE fl_2018_svi_tract
  SET geom=ST_MakeValid(ST_RemoveRepeatedPoints(geom));"

# add local geometry column and reproject existing geometries into local EPSG:
SELECT AddGeometryColumn (
  'fl_2018_svi_tract',
  'geom_local',2236,'multipolygon',2
);
UPDATE fl_2018_svi_tract
  SET geom_local=ST_MakeValid(ST_RemoveRepeatedPoints(ST_Transform(ST_Multi(geom),2236)));
CREATE INDEX fl_2018_svi_tract_geom_local_idx
  ON fl_2018_svi_tract
  USING GIST (geom_local);
NOTIFY pgrst, 'reload schema';"
